Former 'Black Eyed Peas' Hip-Hop Pop-Music Front-Runner Fergie (a.k.a. 'Stacy Ann Ferguson') Is 50
Former Black Eyed Peas hip-hop pop-music front-runner Stacy Ann Ferguson, a.k.a. “Fergie,” is now a half-century old, a.k.a. “50.”. Fergie was born March 27, 1975, in Hacienda Heights, CA to parents Theresa Ann Gore and Jon Patrick Ferguson. After finding early “Big ‘80s” fame as a child star on TV shows like Kids Incorporated, and various Peanuts specials, Stacy Ann Ferguson’s star began to go international when co-founded the girl group Wild Orchid, and performed on two albums in the 1990s.
